cards.rules_text: Discard a card: Lands you control become Plains in addition to their other types until end of turn if that card is white. Whenever you play a land, if it doesn’t have a land type or it shares a land type with a land you control, sacrifice a land.

Attune [i](Add text based on basic land types among different lands you control)[/i]
{G}{G}{G}{G}|Trample.
{G}{G}{G}{G}{G}{G}|Other creatures you control get +2/+2 and have trample. 
{G}{G}{G}{G}{G}{G}{G}{G}|Creatures you control get +2/+2.

Noncreature spells cost {1} more to cast.
When Mountaineer Scout enters, you may destroy target noncreature permanent.

Attune [i](Add text based on basic land types among different lands you control)[/i]
When Lost Forest Shrine enters, search your library for a basic land card, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
{G}{G}{U}{U}|At the beginning of your end step, you gain 3 life. You may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield.

When Battle of the Tower enters, acquire an Ally card. [i](Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal an Ally card. Put that card into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.)[/i]
Whenever an Ally or Warrior enters under your control, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

Sacred Emissary gets +2/+2 and has first strike as long as you control an Angel.
If you would draw a card, you may instead search your library for a Angel card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. You lose life equal to its mana value.
Return each nonland permanent to its owner’s hand. Take an extra turn after this one. Exile Lost From the World.

Whenever Zirlir, Prodigious Decipherer deals combat damage to a player, if you control three or more artifacts, draw a card.
Artifact spells you cast have attune and “{U}{G}|When this enters, create a 1/1 colorless Servo creature token.”

Profane Emissary gets +2/+2 and has lifelink as long as you control a Demon.
If you would draw a card, you may instead search your library for a Demon card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. You lose life equal to that card’s mana value.

Whenever a Demon enters under your control, target opponent loses life equal to its power.
Whenever a Demon dies under your control, you draw a card and lose 1 life.

cards.special_text:
[+2]: Target creature must attack a Winmeari planeswalker next turn if able.
[0]: The Night Riders’ Bane becomes a 4/4 Angel creature with flying and menace until end of turn. [i](She doesn’t lose loyalty while not a planeswalker)[/i]
[-3]: The Night Riders’ Bane deals 3 damage to any target.

cards.notes:
Uncommon —> Mythic
+1/+1 —> +X/+0, where x is the exiled creatures power
Equip 2 —> Equip 3

cards.rules_text: For each color, return of a land that could produce that color of mana from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.

Spells you cast from your graveyard cost {1} less to cast.
Whenever you cast a spell from your graveyard, you gain 2 life.

Whenever a nontoken Warlock you control deals combat damage to a player, create a 1/1 blue and black Warlock creature token with “When this creature dies, surveil 1” [i](To surveil 1, look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)[/i]

Haste
{T}, Sacrifice a creature: Target player discards a card and loses 1 life. You draw a card and gain 1 life.

Autumn Mage can’t be blocked by creatures with lesser power.
[i]Landfall[/i] — Whenever a land enters under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Autumn Mage.

Whenever Armored Recruiter enters, conjure a card named New Recruit into your hand. [i](They’re 2/1 Human Warrior Allies that cost {W})[/i]
Whenever you create a token or cast a spell named New Recruit, you may draw a card. This ability triggers only once each turn.
Once each turn, when a card leaves your graveyard, each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

When Volcano Sage enters, conjure a card named Seek Answers into your hand. [i](It’s an instant that costs {UR} and has  “Acquire a noncreature card”)[/i]
Whenever you conjure one or more cards, Volcano Sage deals 1 damage to target opponent.

When Corrupted Forester enters or attacks, mill three cards.
{B}{G}, Exile a card from your graveyard: Return a card that shares a type with that card from your graveyard to your hand. Activate only once during each of your turns.

Attacking Warriors and Allies you control have first strike.
Whenever a nontoken Warrior enters under your control, create a 1/1 Ally creature token that’s all colors.

Attune [i](Add text based on basic land types among different lands you control)[/i]
When Alanar Water Mage enters, search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
{G}{G}{U}{U}|Whenever you cast a spell with attune, you gain 2 life and draw a card.

When Cave of Ice enters, conjure two cards named Seek Answers into your hand. [i](They’re instants that cost {UR} and have “Acquire a noncreature card.”)[/i]
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, scry 1, then tap up to one target creature.
cards.notes: Conjure call of control —> Conjure seek answers

cards.rules_text:
When The Circle of Ash enters, you may sacrifice a creature. If you do, destroy target creature.
Warlocks and Demons you control get +1/+1.
When Erki, Blade of Darkness enters or attacks, if you sacrificed two or more permanents this turn, target opponent sacrifices a creature and you draw a card.

When Attuned Landscape enters, search your library for a card with attune, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
Whenever you cast a spell with attune, you may search your library for a basic land card, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

Other creatures you control named Unending Reinforcements get +1/+1.
Whenever you attack with one or more Allies, you may conjure three duplicates of Unending Reinforcements and shuffle them into your library.
Return target creature from your graveyard to the battlefield. Sacrifice it.

Reveal your hand. For each card in it, conjure a duplicate of it and shuffle it into your main library.
Draw a card.
Flashback—{UR}, Discard a card. [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)[/i]
Return up to two target land cards from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.

Allies and Warriors you control get +1/+0. If there are 5 or more eminence counters on Raziq, Desert Hero, they get an additional +1/+1.
Whenever a creature you control attacks, put an eminence counter on Raziq.

Attune [i](Add text based on basic land types among different lands you control)[/i]
You may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped.
 {G}{G}{GU}{U}{U}| Acquire a card with attune. [i](Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a card with attune. Put that card into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.)[/i]

Attune [i](Add text based on basic land types among different lands you control)[/i]
{U}|Instant spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
{R}|Sorcery spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
{G}|Whenever you cast a spell, scry 1.
Once during each of your turns, when a card is put into your graveyard from anywhere other than the battlefield, each opponent loses 2 life.

When Gate to the Tower enters, create a 1/1 blue and black Warlock creature token with “When this creature dies, surveil 1 [i](Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)[/i]
{1}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice a Demon or Warlock: Target player loses 2 life.

As Altar of Lost Colors enters, choose a basic land type. Lands you control are that type in addition to their other types.
{T}, Sacrifice a creature: Acquire a card with attune. [i](Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a card with attune. Put that card into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.)[/i]

Creature tokens you control get +1/+1.
{T}: Sacrifice a creature: You gain 3 life and draw a card.

When Altar of Lost Curiosity enters, mill two cards, then draw two cards.
{T}, Sacrifice a creature: Remove or put a time counter on target permanent.
{T}, Sacrifice Evolving Wilds: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

{T}: Add {C}.
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice Marraq: Create a 1/1 Ally creature token that’s all colors.

{T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Add one mana of any color among Warlock, Wizard, instant, or sorcery spells you’ve cast this turn.

Attune [i](Add text based on basic land types among different lands you control)[/i]
{T}: Add {C}.
{U}{R}{G}|{T}: Add one mana of any color.
{W}{W}{U}{U}{B}{B}{R}{R}{G}{G}|When Verdant Cliffside enters, you win the game.

{T}: Add {W} or {U}.
The Ice Wastes enters tapped. When it does, tap up to one target creature.

{T}: Add {C}.
{1}: Iriatu Falls becomes a Plains, Island, Swamp, Mountain, and Forest until end of turn. Activate only once each turn.

Kiral, Desert Village enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {R} or {W}.
{1}{R}{W}, {T}, Sacrifice Kiral, Desert Village: Search your library for a legendary creature card with mana value 2 or less, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

{T}: Add {C}.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice The Corrupted Lands: Search your library for a land card that could produce {C}, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

Once each turn, when a land enters the battlefield under your control, acquire a nonland card. [i](Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a nonland card. Put that card into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.)[/i]
Once each turn, when a nonland permanent enters the battlefield under your control, acquire a land card.

{R}{R}{R}|Trample, Protection from Blue
{R}{R}{R}{R}|Whenever Akali Lava Giant enters or attacks, it deals 2 damage to any target.
{R}{R}{R}{R}{R}{R}|Creatures you control get +2/+0.

Ward—Discard two cards, Sacrifice two permanents.
Whenever a creature dies for the first time each turn, return it to the battlefield under your control. Put a finality counter on it. It’s a Warlock in addition to its other types.

Flash
When Lost Servant enters, conjure a duplicate of target noncreature spell into your hand.

Whenever you cast an instant spell, scry 2.

This spell costs {1} less to cast for each Warlock you control.
Counter target spell. Acquire a card that shares a card type with it. [i](Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a card that shares a card type with it. Put that card into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.)[/i]

This spell costs {1} less to cast for each Warrior and Ally you control.
Creatures you control get +2/+0 and gain haste until end of turn.

{T}: Target land you control becomes the basic land type of your choice in addition to its other types until end of turn.
{G}{G}{U}{U}{R}|At the beginning of your first main phase, scry 1, then draw a card.

Destroy target creature. Then discard a card unless there are seven or more cards in your graveyard.

cards.special_text:
[+1]: Create a 1/1 Ally creature token that’s all colors.
[-1]: Look at the top three cards of your library. You may reveal permanent card from among them and put it into your hand, then put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
[-X]: Exile target creature with mana value X or less until Drorix leaves the battlefield.

cards.rules_text: Once each turn, when you cast a permanent spell, you may cast a permanent spell from your hand with mana value 1 greater than the spell cast without paying its mana cost.
